I. SYSTEM – INPUTS
AND PROCESSES

laboratory.

neat, clean and
orderly.

I.6. Waste disposal is
efficiently and

The campus is

CvSU 5s Good
Housekeeping Project

Policy

The campus is
implementing the

Policy

The campus prohibits
the use of Single Use
Plastics.

There is a recyclable
metal box within the
vicinity
